Class SpaceUtil

    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.SpaceUtil
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public final class SpaceUtil
extends Object
    Size utility class used to ensure consistent spacing of intra-component gaps and Margins For backwards compatibility only.
    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    Mark Reeves, John McGuiness

public static Size intToSize(int convert)
        Deprecated. 
        Convert an int space to a Size. For backwards compatibility during conversion of int spaces to Size spaces.
        Parameters:
        convert - the int size to convert
        Returns:
        a Size appropriate to the int

      • sizeToInt

        @Deprecated
public static int sizeToInt(Size size)
        Deprecated. 
        Convert a size back to a representative int. For testing only during conversion of int spaces to Size spaces.
        Parameters:
        size - the Size to convert
        Returns:
        an int representative of the Size
